entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
